Platform.Title: Yeast Splicing Chip v4.0
Platform.Description: This is an oligonucleotide microarray designed to measure splicing in yeast. Each intron containing gene has 3 features (Splice Junction, Intron, Exon2). The SJ oligo symmetrically spans the splice junction with 20nt on each side. The SJ, Int, and Ex2 oligos are custom designed 40-mers. The array also contains about 1000 70-mers from the Operon Yeast Genome Set. All of the SJ, Int, and Ex2 oligos are printed 4 times, the Operon 70-mers are printed only once. Keywords = Splicing

Column.Name: Intron
Column.Description: Is the Feature from an Intron-containing gene?

Column.Name: Block
Column.Description: Block that the spot was printed in

Sample.Title: prp4-TempShift-0mins_5
Sample.Description: Prp4-1 and wt strains were grown at 26deg to A600 of 1.0, then an equal volume of 48deg media was added to bring the temperature to 37deg. Both strains were allowed to grow at 37deg and samples were taken at 0 (before shift), 5, 15, 30, 60, and 120 mins after shift to restrictive temperature. Lot batch = Slide4-32

Column.Name: SPOT_SIZE
Column.Description: Size of the spot (diameter, in microns)

Column.Name: CH2_SD
Column.Description: Channel 2 (Cy5/635) standard deviation of pixel intensities - feature

Column.Name: CH2_PERCNT_PIX_1SD
Column.Description: Channel 2 (Cy5/635) percent of pixels 1 StDev above background

Column.Name: CH2_PERCNT_PIX_2SD
Column.Description: Channel 2 (Cy5/635) percent of pixels 2 StDevs above background

Column.Name: CH1_SD
Column.Description: Channel 1 (Cy3/532) standard deviation of pixel intensities - feature

Column.Name: CH1_PERCNT_PIX_1SD
Column.Description: Channel 1 (Cy3/532) percent of pixels 1 StDev above background

Column.Name: CH1_PERCNT_PIX_2SD
Column.Description: Channel 1 (Cy3/532) percent of pixels 2 StDevs above background

Column.Name: CH2_MED_MINUS_BKD
Column.Description: Channel 2 (Cy5/635) background subtracted median feature intensity

Column.Name: CH1_MED_MINUS_BKD
Column.Description: Channel 1 (Cy3/532) background subtracted median feature intensity

Column.Name: CH2_MEAN_MINUS_BKD
Column.Description: Channel 2 (Cy5/635) background subtracted mean feature intensity

Column.Name: CH1_MEAN_MINUS_BKD
Column.Description: Channel 1 (Cy3/532) background subtracted mean feature intensity

Column.Name: MEAN_VALUE
Column.Description: Average normalized log ratio for replicate spots

Column.Name: SD_VALUE
Column.Description: Standard deviation of average normalized log ratio

Column.Name: NUM_REPLICATES
Column.Description: Number of replicate spots used in average normalized log ratio

Series.Title: Prp4-1 temperature shift
Series.Summary: Prp4-1 and wt strains were grown at 26°C to A600 of 1.0, then an equal volume of 48°C media was added to bring the temperature to 37°C. Both strains were allowed to grow at 37°C and samples were taken at 0 (before shift), 5, 15, 30, 60, and 120 mins after shift to restrictive temperature. Keywords = splicing Keywords: time-course
